info.description: Compozy is a workflow orchestration engine for AI agents, tasks, and tools
info.title: Compozy API

get.description: Retrieve a list of all workflow executions across all workflows
Retrieve a specific workflow execution by its execution ID
Retrieve a list of all available workflow configurations
Retrieve a specific workflow configuration by its ID
Retrieve a list of all available agent configurations
Retrieve a specific agent configuration by its ID
Retrieve all executions for a specific workflow

post.description: Trigger the execution of a workflow with provided input data

get.description: Retrieve a list of all tasks within a specific workflow
Retrieve a specific task configuration by its ID within a workflow
Retrieve a list of all available tool configurations
Retrieve a specific tool configuration by its ID
